Misa:
Hey! You'll join! Let me start by wishing you good luck... I always start with that.
Now to get you up to speed. Guild informants have disappeared, one by one, while gathering information on the Queen...
We just learned why.
Or at least what. The Ice Queen transformed them... into ice. I just KNOW they were hot on the trail of something important! Can you pick up where the trail leaves off? Our associates were found in their cursed state on the plain above the North corner from the Ice Queen's castle entrance. You'll have to be careful.
